title: Between generations
creator_credit: Rebecca Phillips, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Rebecca Phillips considers how much has changed since her mother went to school. Perhaps she could now sit at the tables and play with the other kids, but she still felt ostracised for being different. Despite this, she has learnt to be proud of her heritage and found her place in the world.
creator_credit_for_label: Rebecca Phillips, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
